menuSystem

Class MenuFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • menuSystem.MenuFactory

  • public class MenuFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class to return the desired menu whenever it is requested The menu will only be created once and we will always return that same menu
    Author:
    Bryton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The variable holding the single player menu

      A private construct to ensure this class is never created.
